completedResearch.findings: New Architecture with Hermes engine provides better performance and memory management. Required for Expo SDK 52.
Observable pattern with 5KB bundle size, fine-grained reactivity. Perfect for vertical slicing architecture with minimal re-renders.
File-based routing with typed routes. Requires app/ directory structure (NOT src/). Supports tab navigation and nested routes.
Features organized by domain with isolated state stores. Pattern: features/{name}/state/store.ts. Avoids centralized stores and tight coupling.
Core mechanics: click-to-earn, automated production, resource conversion chains, prestige systems, achievement frameworks. 60 FPS game loop essential.
Target metrics: 60 FPS consistent, <50ms input response, <200MB memory usage, <50MB iOS/<30MB Android bundle size. Requires careful optimization.
EAS Build system supports all platforms. Requires proper configuration for App Store and Google Play submission. Web deployment via Expo hosting.

keyFindings: CRITICAL: Must use vertical slicing architecture with features/{name}/state/store.ts pattern
CRITICAL: Must use app/ directory for Expo Router (NOT src/ directory)
CRITICAL: No centralized gameStore.ts allowed - violates architectural requirements
Performance targets are aggressive - requires careful optimization throughout development
Legend State's observable pattern is key to achieving performance targets with minimal re-renders
Game requires complex resource conversion chains: Code → Features → Revenue
Achievement system needs 50+ achievements across 8 categories with different rarity levels
Prestige system includes Investor Points, funding rounds, and compound bonus calculations
Audio system requires contextual feedback based on game events and player actions
Save system must include validation, backups, and cloud sync preparation

architecturalDecisions.decision: Use Vertical Slicing with Feature-Specific Stores
architecturalDecisions.rationale: Enforced by technical requirements. Enables independent development, testing, and maintenance of game features.
architecturalDecisions.impact: High - affects entire codebase structure and development approach

architecturalDecisions.decision: Legend State for Reactive State Management
architecturalDecisions.rationale: 5KB bundle, fine-grained reactivity, perfect for performance targets. Observable pattern reduces re-renders.
architecturalDecisions.impact: High - affects all state management and component updates

architecturalDecisions.decision: Expo Router with app/ Directory Structure
architecturalDecisions.rationale: Required by Expo Router v4. Provides file-based routing with type safety.
architecturalDecisions.impact: Medium - affects navigation and project structure

architecturalDecisions.decision: 60 FPS Game Loop with Delta Time
architecturalDecisions.rationale: Essential for smooth idle/incremental game experience. Required for performance targets.
architecturalDecisions.impact: High - affects core game mechanics and user experience

architecturalDecisions.rationale: Maintains feature isolation while enabling necessary communication between departments, achievements, etc.
architecturalDecisions.impact: Medium - affects how features interact with each other
